title: Dare to Love - Novel Updates
tags: Absent Parents   Beautiful Female Lead   Clingy Lover   C*nnilingus   Complex Family Relationships   Devoted Love Interests   Disabilities   Famous Parents   Female Protagonist   F*llatio   Friendship   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Jealousy   Loneliness   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Lovers Reunited   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Obsessive Love   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Possessive Characters   Pregnancy   R-18   S*x Friends   Time Skip   Unconditional Love   Wealthy Characters
author: Kim-ppa   김빠
description:
The arrogant man who seeks perfection, hotel CEO Min SeonJae.
The woman who expresses the shape of love, hearing-impaired florist Lee YeonJung.

He finally realized why he put the woman inside his car at the parking lot as if he were kidnapping her. It wasn’t out of sympathy. He had never once felt sympathy for anyone in the thirty-two years of his life. 

He was sexually attracted to her. Unbelievably attracted.

“I’m… using you righ’ now, you know.”

“It doesn’t matter.”

No matter what it took, he wanted to leave traces of himself in her silent world.>
